newsitem.title: UK: BTP buys U.S. leather chemicals business.
newsitem.headline: BTP buys U.S. leather chemicals business.

text.p: International specialty chemicals group BTP Plc said on Wednesday that its Hodgson Process Chemicals Inc subsidiary had bought a leather chemicals business in the U.S. for $7.5 million in cash.

In a statement it said it was acquiring the Leather Processing Chemicals business of Henkel Corp, including production facilities in Wisonsin. BTP's Performance Chemicals division is already a major producer of leather-processing products
BTP finance director Rob Martin told Reuters the acquisition would be a springboard for the group in the U.S. leather market.
